product_name: Sherpani Trevia Cross Body Tote Bag - Women's
long_description: Sized to carry the daily essentials, the slim and sleek Sherpani Trevia Cross Body bag won't weigh you down during urban adventures. Zippered main compartment stows daily essentials in a variety of organizational pockets; key tether secures car keys. Generous exterior pockets include a zip-close pocket, buckle-close flap pocket, a rear drop-in pocket and a stretch-mesh side bottle pocket. Adjustable shoulder strap allows you to wear bag across your body or over your shoulder; also includes double carry handles. Made of a soft and durable cotton/poly fabric blend. Contrast stitching and zipper pulls, and brushed metal buckles add style to the Sherpani Trevia Cross Body bag.
short_description: Sized to carry the daily essentials, the slim and sleek Sherpani Trevia Cross Body bag won't weigh you down during urban adventures.
